title: The NFL Is Ruining Michael Barr’s Weekend (Podcast)
itunes:title: The NFL Is Ruining Michael Barr’s Weekend (Podcast)
description:
Jason Kelly, Michael Barr and Mike Lynch discuss the biggest stories this week in the Business of Sports. On today’s podcast, they talk about the possible unintended consequences of an NFL 17-week season. Michael Barr’s “Sunday” Dayton 500 may be a causality. We also discuss the NCAA tournament’s success as they close in on the finish line, along with the prospects of those athletes earning a paycheck. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
